convert_to_meters.title: Convert_To_Meters
convert_to_meters.description: Value to use to convert the current model into meters

faces.title: Faces
faces.description: List of model faces, can be of type Face or ShadeFace

EnergyMaterial.title: EnergyMaterial
EnergyMaterial.description: Material 'types' used to describe layers within opaque construction elements.

thickness.title: Thickness
thickness.description: Thickness of the material layer in meters.

conductivity.title: Conductivity
conductivity.description: Thermal conductivity of the material layer in W/(m-K).

density.title: Density
density.description: Density of the material layer in kg/m3.

specific_heat.title: Specific_Heat
specific_heat.description: Specific heat of the material layer in J/(kg-K).

thermal_absorptance.title: Thermal_Absorptance
thermal_absorptance.description: Fraction of incident long wavelength radiation that is absorbed by the material. Default value is 0.9.

solar_absorptance.title: Solar_Absorptance
solar_absorptance.description: Fraction of incident solar radiation absorbed by the material. Default value is 0.7.

visible_absorptance.title: Visible_Absorptance
visible_absorptance.description: Fraction of incident visible wavelength radiation absorbed by the material. Default value is 0.7.

EnergyMaterialNoMass.title: EnergyMaterialNoMass
EnergyMaterialNoMass.description:
Used when only the thermal resistance (R value) of the material is known. Used for 
opaque construction elements.

r_value.title: R_Value
r_value.description: Used to enter the thermal resistance (R-value) of the material layer in (m2-K)/W.

thermal_absorptance.title: Thermal_Absorptance
thermal_absorptance.description: Fraction of incident long wavelength radiation that is absorbed by the material. Default value is 0.9.

solar_absorptance.title: Solar_Absorptance
solar_absorptance.description: Fraction of incident solar radiation absorbed by the material. Default value is 0.7.

visible_absorptance.title: Visible_Absorptance
visible_absorptance.description: Fraction of incident visible wavelength radiation absorbed by the material. Default value is 0.7.

EnergyWindowMaterialAirGap.title: EnergyWindowMaterialAirGap
EnergyWindowMaterialAirGap.description:
Create single layer of air gap.

    Air gap can be combined with EnergyWindowMaterialGlazing to make multi-pane windows.

thickness.title: Thickness
thickness.description: Thickness of the air gap in meters. Default value is 0.0125.

conductivity_coeff_A.title: Conductivity_Coeff_A
conductivity_coeff_A.description: The A coefficient for gas conductivity in W/(m-K). Used only if Gas Type is Custom.

conductivity_coeff_B.title: Conductivity_Coeff_B
conductivity_coeff_B.description: The A coefficient for gas conductivity in W/(m-K2). Used only if Gas Type is Custom.

conductivity_coeff_C.title: Conductivity_Coeff_C
conductivity_coeff_C.description: The A coefficient for gas conductivity in W/(m-K3). Used only if Gas Type is Custom.

viscosity_coeff_A.title: Viscosity_Coeff_A
viscosity_coeff_A.description: The A coefficient for gas viscosity in kg/(m-s). Used only if Gas Type is Custom.

viscosity_coeff_B.title: Viscosity_Coeff_B
viscosity_coeff_B.description: The B coefficient for gas viscosity in kg/(m-s-K). Used only if Gas Type is Custom.

viscosity_coeff_C.title: Viscosity_Coeff_C
viscosity_coeff_C.description: The C coefficient for gas viscosity in kg/(m-s-K2). Used only if Gas Type is Custom.

specific_heat_coeff_A.title: Specific_Heat_Coeff_A
specific_heat_coeff_A.description: The A coefficient for gas specific heat in J/(kg-K). Used only if Gas Type is Custom.

specific_heat_coeff_B.title: Specific_Heat_Coeff_B
specific_heat_coeff_B.description: The B coefficient for gas specific heat in J/(kg-K2). Used only if Gas Type is Custom.

specific_heat_coeff_C.title: Specific_Heat_Coeff_C
specific_heat_coeff_C.description: The C coefficient for gas specific heat in J/(kg-K3). Used only if Gas Type is Custom.

specific_heat_ratio.title: Specific_Heat_Ratio
specific_heat_ratio.description: The specific heat ratio for gas. Used only if Gas Type is Custom.

molecular_weight.title: Molecular_Weight
molecular_weight.description: The molecular weight for gas in g/mol. Used only if Gas Type is Custom.

EnergyWindowMaterialSimpleGlazSys.title: EnergyWindowMaterialSimpleGlazSys
EnergyWindowMaterialSimpleGlazSys.description:
Describe an entire glazing system rather than individual layers.

    Used when only very limited information is available on the glazing layers or when
    specific performance levels are being targeted.

u_factor.title: U_Factor
u_factor.description: Used to describe the value for window system U-Factor, or overall heat transfer coefficient in W/(m2-K).

SHGC.title: Shgc
SHGC.description: Unitless  quantity describing Solar Heat Gain Coefficient for normal incidence and vertical orientation.

EnergyWindowMaterialBlind.title: EnergyWindowMaterialBlind
EnergyWindowMaterialBlind.description:
Window blind properties.

    Window blind properties consist of flat, equally-spaced slats.

slat_orientation.title: Slat_Orientation
enum: Choices including Horizontal and Vertical. Horizontal means the slats

slat_width.title: Slat_Width
slat_width.description: The width of slat measured from edge to edge in meters.

slat_separation.title: Slat_Separation
slat_separation.description: The distance between the front of a slat and the back of the adjacent slat in meters.

slat_thickness.title: Slat_Thickness
slat_thickness.description: The distance between the faces of a slat in meters. The default value is 0.001.

slat_angle.title: Slat_Angle
slat_angle.description: The angle (degrees) between the glazing outward normal and the slat outward normal where the outward normal points away from the front face of the slat (degrees). The default value is 45.

slat_conductivity.title: Slat_Conductivity
slat_conductivity.description: The thermal conductivity of the slat in W/(m-K). Default value is 221.

beam_solar_transmittance.title: Beam_Solar_Transmittance
beam_solar_transmittance.description: The beam solar transmittance of the slat, assumed to be independent of angle of incidence on the slat. Any transmitted beam radiation is assumed to be 100% diffuse (i.e., slats are translucent). The default value is 0.

front_beam_solar_reflectance.title: Front_Beam_Solar_Reflectance
front_beam_solar_reflectance.description: The beam solar reflectance of the front side of the slat, it is assumed to be independent of the angle of incidence. Default value is 0.5.

back_beam_solar_reflectance.title: Back_Beam_Solar_Reflectance
back_beam_solar_reflectance.description: The beam solar reflectance of the back side of the slat, it is assumed to be independent of the angle of incidence. Default value is 0.5.

diffuse_solar_transmittance.title: Diffuse_Solar_Transmittance
diffuse_solar_transmittance.description: The slat transmittance for hemisperically diffuse solar radiation. Default value is 0.

front_diffuse_solar_reflectance.title: Front_Diffuse_Solar_Reflectance
front_diffuse_solar_reflectance.description: The front-side slat reflectance for hemispherically diffuse solar radiation. Default value is 0.5.

back_diffuse_solar_reflectance.title: Back_Diffuse_Solar_Reflectance
back_diffuse_solar_reflectance.description: The back-side slat reflectance for hemispherically diffuse solar radiation. Default value is 0.5.

beam_visible_transmittance.title: Beam_Visible_Transmittance
beam_visible_transmittance.description: The beam visible tranmsittance of the slat, it is assumed to be independent of the angle of incidence. Default value is 0.

front_beam_visible_reflectance.title: Front_Beam_Visible_Reflectance
front_beam_visible_reflectance.description: The beam visible reflectance on the front side of the slat, it is assumed to be independent of the angle of incidence. Default value is 0.5.

back_beam_visible_reflectance.title: Back_Beam_Visible_Reflectance
back_beam_visible_reflectance.description: The beam visible reflectance on the back side of the slat, it is assumed to be independent of the angle of incidence. Default value is 0.5.

diffuse_visible_transmittance.title: Diffuse_Visible_Transmittance
diffuse_visible_transmittance.description: The slat transmittance for hemispherically diffuse visible radiation. This value should equal “Slat Beam Visible Transmittance.”

front_diffuse_visible_reflectance.title: Front_Diffuse_Visible_Reflectance
front_diffuse_visible_reflectance.description: The front-side slat reflectance for hemispherically diffuse visible radiation. This value should equal “Front Side Slat Beam Visible Reflectance.” Default value is 0.5.

back_diffuse_visible_reflectance.title: Back_Diffuse_Visible_Reflectance
back_diffuse_visible_reflectance.description: The back-side slat reflectance for hemispherically diffuse visible radiation. This value should equal “Back Side Slat Beam Visible Reflectance. Default value is 0.5.”

infrared_hemispherical_transmittance.title: Infrared_Hemispherical_Transmittance
infrared_hemispherical_transmittance.description: The slat infrared transmittance. It is zero for solid metallic, wooden or glass slats, but may be non-zero in some cases such as for thin plastic slats. The default value is 0.

front_infrared_hemispherical_emissivity.title: Front_Infrared_Hemispherical_Emissivity
front_infrared_hemispherical_emissivity.description: Front side hemispherical emissivity of the slat. Default is 0.9 for most materials. The default value is 0.9.

back_infrared_hemispherical_emissivity.title: Back_Infrared_Hemispherical_Emissivity
back_infrared_hemispherical_emissivity.description: Back side hemispherical emissivity of the slat. Default is 0.9 for most materials. The default value is 0.9.

blind_toglass_distance.title: Blind_Toglass_Distance
blind_toglass_distance.description: The distance from the mid-plane of the blind to the adjacent glass in meters. The default value is 0.05.

top_opening_multiplier.title: Top_Opening_Multiplier
top_opening_multiplier.description: The effective area for air flow at the top of the shade, divided by the horizontal area between glass and shade. The default value is 0.5

bottom_opening_multiplier.title: Bottom_Opening_Multiplier
bottom_opening_multiplier.description: The effective area for air flow at the bottom of the shade, divided by the horizontal area between glass and shade. The default value is 0.5.

left_opening_multiplier.title: Left_Opening_Multiplier
left_opening_multiplier.description: The effective area for air flow at the left side of the shade, divided by the vertical area between glass and shade. The default value is 0.5.

right_opening_multiplier.title: Right_Opening_Multiplier
right_opening_multiplier.description: The effective area for air flow at the right side of the shade, divided by the vertical area between glass and shade. The default value is 0.5.

minimum_slat_angle.title: Minimum_Slat_Angle
minimum_slat_angle.description: The minimum allowed slat angle in degrees. The default value is 0.

maximum_slat_angle.title: Maximum_Slat_Angle
maximum_slat_angle.description: The maximum allowed slat angle in degrees. The default value is 180.

EnergyWindowMaterialGlazing.title: EnergyWindowMaterialGlazing
EnergyWindowMaterialGlazing.description: Describe a single glass pane corresponding to a layer in a window construction.

spectral_dataset_name.title: Spectral_Dataset_Name
spectral_dataset_name.description: Used to specify name of the spectral data set if optical data type = Spectral.

thickness_glass.title: Thickness_Glass
thickness_glass.description: The surface-to-surface of the glass in meters. Default value is 0.003.

solar_transmittance.title: Solar_Transmittance
solar_transmittance.description: Transmittance of solar radiation through the glass at normal incidence. Default value is 0.

solar_reflectance.title: Solar_Reflectance
solar_reflectance.description: Reflectance of solar radiation off of the front side of the glass at normal incidence, averaged over the solar spectrum. Default value is 0.

solar_reflectance_back.title: Solar_Reflectance_Back
solar_reflectance_back.description: Reflectance of solar radiation off of the back side of the glass at normal incidence, averaged over the solar spectrum.

visible_transmittance.title: Visible_Transmittance
visible_transmittance.description: Transmittance of visible light through the glass at normal incidence. Default value is 0.

visible_reflectance.title: Visible_Reflectance
visible_reflectance.description: Reflectance of visible light off of the front side of the glass at normal incidence. Default value is 0.

visible_reflectance_back.title: Visible_Reflectance_Back
visible_reflectance_back.description: Reflectance of visible light off of the back side of the glass at normal incidence averaged over the solar spectrum and weighted by the response of the human eye.

front_emissivity.title: Front_Emissivity
front_emissivity.description: Infrared hemispherical emissivity of the front (outward facing) side of the glass.  Default value is 0.84, which is typical for clear glass without a low-e coating.

back_emissivity.title: Back_Emissivity
back_emissivity.description: Infrared hemispherical emissivity of the back (inward facing) side of the glass.  Default value is 0.84, which is typical for clear glass without a low-e coating.

conductivity_glass.title: Conductivity_Glass
conductivity_glass.description: Thermal conductivity of the glass in W/(m-K). Default value is 0.9, which is  typical for clear glass without a low-e coating.

dirt_correction.title: Dirt_Correction
dirt_correction.description: Factor that corrects for the presence of dirt on the glass. A default value of 1 indicates the glass is clean.

EnergyWindowMaterialShade.title: EnergyWindowMaterialShade
EnergyWindowMaterialShade.description: This object specifies the properties of window shade materials.

solar_transmittance.title: Solar_Transmittance
solar_transmittance.description: The transmittance averaged over the solar spectrum. It is assumed independent of incidence angle. Default value is 0.4.

solar_reflectance.title: Solar_Reflectance
solar_reflectance.description: The reflectance averaged over the solar spectrum. It us assumed same on both sides of shade and independent of incidence angle. Default value is 0.5

visible_transmittance.title: Visible_Transmittance
visible_transmittance.description: The transmittance averaged over the solar spectrum and weighted by the response of the human eye. It is assumed independent of incidence angle. Default value is 0.4.

visible_reflectance.title: Visible_Reflectance
visible_reflectance.description: The transmittance averaged over the solar spectrum and weighted by the response of the human eye. It is assumed independent of incidence angle. Default value is 0.4

infrared_hemispherical_emissivity.title: Infrared_Hemispherical_Emissivity
infrared_hemispherical_emissivity.description: The effective long-wave emissivity. It is assumed same on both sides of shade. Default value is 0.9.

infrared_transmittance.title: Infrared_Transmittance
infrared_transmittance.description: The effective long-wave transmittance. It is assumed independent of incidence angle. Default value is 0.

thickness.title: Thickness
thickness.description: The thickness of the shade material in meters. Default value is 0.005.

conductivity.title: Conductivity
conductivity.description: The conductivity of the shade material in W/(m-K). Default value is 0.1.

shade_toglass_distance.title: Shade_Toglass_Distance
shade_toglass_distance.description: The distance from shade to adjacent glass in meters. Default value is 0.05

top_opening_multiplier.title: Top_Opening_Multiplier
top_opening_multiplier.description: The effective area for air flow at the top of the shade, divided by the horizontal area between glass and shade. Default value is 0.

bottom_opening_multiplier.title: Bottom_Opening_Multiplier
bottom_opening_multiplier.description: The effective area for air flow at the bottom of the shade, divided by the horizontal area between glass and shade. Default value is 0.

left_opening_multiplier.title: Left_Opening_Multiplier
left_opening_multiplier.description: The effective area for air flow at the left side of the shade, divided by the vertical area between glass and shade. Default value is 0.

right_opening_multiplier.title: Right_Opening_Multiplier
right_opening_multiplier.description: The effective area for air flow at the right side of the shade, divided by the vertical area between glass and shade. Default value is 0.

airflow_permeability.title: Airflow_Permeability
airflow_permeability.description: The fraction of the shade surface that is open to air flow. If air cannot pass through the shade material, airflow_permeability = 0. Default value is 0.

rad_modifier_dir.title: Rad_Modifier_Dir
rad_modifier_dir.description: Radiance material for direct sunlight simulation.

energy_construction_opaque.title: EnergyConstructionOpaque
energy_construction_opaque.description:
Group of objects to describe the physical properties and configuration for 
the building envelope and interior elements that is the walls, roofs, floors, 
and doors of the building.

materials.title: Materials
materials.description: List of materials. The order of the materials is from outside to inside.

energy_construction_transparent.title: EnergyConstructionTransparent
energy_construction_transparent.description:
Group of objects to describe the physical properties and configuration for 
the building envelope and interior elements that is the windows of the building.

materials.title: Materials
materials.description: List of materials. The order of the materials is from outside to inside.

rad_modifier_dir.description: Radiance material for direct sunlight simulation.

energy_construction_opaque.description:
Group of objects to describe the physical properties and configuration for 
the building envelope and interior elements that is the walls, roofs, floors, 
and doors of the building.

materials.title: Materials
materials.description: List of materials. The order of the materials is from outside to inside.

energy_construction_transparent.description:
Group of objects to describe the physical properties and configuration for 
the building envelope and interior elements that is the windows of the building.

materials.title: Materials
materials.description: List of materials. The order of the materials is from outside to inside.

A single model face.

energy_construction_opaque.description:

apertures.title: Apertures
apertures.description: List of Apertures bound to the Face
